short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for products and calculate prices
short.vi: tìm kiếm sản phẩm và tính toán giá

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sion Tee Shirt Chrome extension helps users search for products quickly and efficiently. In addition, the application also supports convenient product cost calculation, especially suitable for those who love fashion and want to experience smart shopping.

Main features:

Quick product search:

Just enter the keyword in the search box, the extension will automatically open a new tab and display a list of suitable products from the official website of Sion Tee Shirt.
Calculate product price:

Select your favorite product type from the list.
Enter the desired quantity, the tool will immediately provide the minimum and maximum estimated cost.
Friendly design:

Intuitive, easy-to-use interface with harmonious color palette and optimized for all screen sizes.
User support:

Provides detailed product information, helping you make decisions easily.
How to use:
Add the extension to the Chrome browser.
Open the extension from the Chrome toolbar to start searching or calculating prices.

Built by SionTeeShirt, a company that strives to provide customers with shirts made from high-quality materials.
